DOC.criteria: Written inform consent obtain Body mass index > 19 < 30kg/m2 , weight least 50 kg Good general health ascertain detailed medical history , laboratory physical examination Evidence clinically significant cardiovascular , renal , hepatic , haematological , GI , pulmonary , metabolicendocrine , neurological psychiatric disease Any condition require regular concomitant treatment ( include vitamin herbal product ) likely need concomitant treatment study .
